ModMetaData.name: FEB's Biopunk Livestock
ModMetaData.author: FEB
ModMetaData.description: Feral and domestic animals bio-engineered for industrial (and post-apocalyptic) uses. v 1.0.3 - Stopped wild gutterhogs from digging up items to prevent pawns from constantly running to retrieve them; - Added compatibility with A Dog Said 2: Animal Prosthetics.
